verses.t: I say{G3004} then{G3767}, Hath{G683} God{G3588} cast away{G683} his{G846} people{G3588}? God forbid{G1096}. For{G1063} I{G1473} also{G2532} am{G1510} an Israelite{G2475}, of{G1537} the seed{G4690} of Abraham{G11}, of the tribe{G5443} of Benjamin{G958}.

God{G3588} hath{G683} not{G3756} cast away{G683} his{G846} people{G3588} which{G3739} he foreknew{G4267}. Lord{G2962}, they have killed{G615} thy{G4675} prophets{G3588}, and{G2532} digged down{G2679} thine{G4675} altars{G3588}; and I{G2504} am left{G5275} alone{G3441}, and{G2532} they seek{G2212} my{G3450} life{G3588}.

But{G235} what{G5101} saith{G3004} the answer of God{G3588} unto him{G846}? I have reserved{G2641} to myself{G1683} seven thousand{G2035} men{G435}, who{G3748} have{G2578} not{G3756} bowed{G2578} the knee{G1119} to{G896} the image of Baal{G896}.
Even so{G3779} then{G3767} at{G1722} this present{G3568} time{G2540} also{G2532} there is{G1096} a remnant{G3005} according to{G2596} the election{G1589} of grace{G5485}.

And{G1161} if{G1487} by grace{G5485}, then{G3765} is it no more{G3765} of{G1537} works{G2041}: otherwise{G1893} grace{G3588} is{G1096} no more{G3765} grace{G5485}. What{G5101} then{G3767}? Israel{G2474} hath{G2013} not{G3756} obtained{G2013} that{G5127} which{G3739} he seeketh for{G1934}; but{G1161} the election{G1589} hath obtained it{G2013}, and{G1161} the rest{G3062} were blinded{G4456}

(According as{G2531} it is written{G1125}, God{G3588} hath given{G1325} them{G846} the spirit{G4151} of slumber{G2659}, eyes{G3788} that they should{G991} not{G3361} see{G991}, and{G2532} ears{G3775} that they should{G191} not{G3361} hear{G191};) unto{G2193} this{G4594} day{G2250}.

And{G2532} David{G1138} saith{G3004}, Let{G1096} their{G846} table{G3588} be made{G1096} a snare{G3803}, and{G2532} a trap{G2339}, and{G2532} a stumblingblock{G4625}, and{G2532} a recompence{G468} unto them{G846}:
Let{G4654} their{G846} eyes{G3588} be darkened{G4654}, that they may{G991} not{G3361} see{G991}, and{G2532} bow down{G4781} their{G846} back{G3588} alway{G1275}.

I say{G3004} then{G3767}, Have they stumbled{G4417} that{G2443} they should fall{G4098}? God forbid{G1096}: but{G235} rather through{G3900} their{G846} fall{G3900} salvation{G3588} is come unto the Gentiles{G3588}, for{G1519} to provoke{G3863} them{G846} to jealousy{G3863}.

Now{G1161} if{G1487} the fall{G3588} of them{G846} be the riches{G4149} of the world{G2889}, and{G2532} the diminishing{G3588} of them{G846} the riches{G4149} of the Gentiles{G1484}; how much{G4214} more{G3123} their{G846} fulness{G3588}?
For{G1063} I speak{G3004} to you{G5213} Gentiles{G3588}, inasmuch as{G3745} I{G1473} am{G1510} the apostle{G652} of the Gentiles{G1484}, I magnify{G1392} mine{G3450} office{G3588}:
If{G1487} by any means{G4459} I may provoke to emulation{G3863} them which are my{G3450} flesh{G3588}, and{G2532} might save{G4982} some{G5100} of{G1537} them{G846}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} the casting away{G3588} of them{G846} be the reconciling{G2643} of the world{G2889}, what{G5101} shall the receiving{G3588} of them be, but{G3361} life{G2222} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}?
For{G1161} if{G1487} the firstfruit{G3588} be holy{G40}, the lump{G3588} is also{G2532} holy: and{G2532} if{G1487} the root{G3588} be holy{G40}, so{G2532} are the branches{G3588}.

And{G1161} if{G1487} some{G5100} of the branches{G3588} be broken off{G1575}, and{G1161} thou{G4771}, being{G5607} a wild olive tree{G65}, wert graffed{G1461} in{G1722} among them{G846}, and{G2532} with them partakest{G4791} of the root{G3588} and{G2532} fatness{G3588} of the olive tree{G3588};
Boast{G2620} not{G3361} against the branches{G3588}. But{G1161} if{G1487} thou boast{G2620}, thou{G4771} bearest{G941} not{G3756} the root{G3588}, but{G235} the root{G3588} thee{G4571}.
Thou wilt say{G2046} then{G3767}, The branches{G3588} were broken off{G1575}, that{G2443} I{G1473} might be graffed in{G1461}.
Well{G2573}; because of unbelief{G3588} they were broken off{G1575}, and{G1161} thou{G4771} standest{G2476} by faith{G3588}. Be{G5309} not{G3361} highminded{G5309}, but{G235} fear{G5399}:
For{G1063} if{G1487} God{G3588} spared{G5339} not{G3756} the{G2798} natural{G5449} branches{G2798}, take heed lest{G3381} he{G5339} also{G3761} spare{G5339} not{G3761} thee{G4675}.

Behold{G1492} therefore{G3767} the goodness{G5544} and{G2532} severity{G663} of God{G2316}: on{G1909} them which fell{G4098}, severity{G663}; but{G1161} toward{G1909} thee{G4571}, goodness{G5544}, if{G1437} thou continue{G1961} in{G3588} his goodness{G5544}: otherwise{G1893} thou{G4771} also{G2532} shalt be cut off{G1581}.

And{G1161} they{G1565} also{G2532}, if{G1437} they abide{G1961} not{G3361} still{G1961} in unbelief{G3588}, shall be graffed in{G1461}: for{G1063} God{G3588} is{G2076} able{G1415} to graff{G1461} them{G846} in{G1461} again{G3825}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} thou{G4771} wert cut out{G1581} of{G1537} the olive tree which is wild{G65} by{G2596} nature{G5449}, and{G2532} wert graffed{G1461} contrary to{G3844} nature{G5449} into{G1519} a good olive tree{G2565}: how much{G4214} more{G3123} shall{G1461} these{G3778}, which be{G3588} the natural{G5449} branches, be graffed into{G1461} their own{G2398} olive tree{G1636}?

For{G1063} I would{G2309} not{G3756}, brethren{G80}, that{G2309} ye{G5209} should be ignorant of{G50} this{G5124} mystery{G3588}, lest{G2443} ye should be{G5600} wise{G5429} in{G3844} your own conceits{G1438}; that{G3754} blindness{G4457} in{G575} part{G3313} is happened{G1096} to Israel{G2474}, until{G891} the fulness{G3588} of the Gentiles{G3588} be come in{G1525}.

And{G2532} so{G3779} all{G3956} Israel{G2474} shall be saved{G4982}: as{G2531} it is written{G1125}, There shall come{G2240} out of{G1537} Sion{G4622} the Deliverer{G4506}, and{G2532} shall turn away{G654} ungodliness{G763} from{G575}Jacob{G2384}:
For{G2532} this{G3778} is my{G1700} covenant{G1242} unto them{G846}, when{G3752} I shall take away{G851} their{G846} sins{G3588}.

As concerning{G2596} the gospel{G3588}, they are enemies{G2190} for{G1223} your{G5209} sakes{G1223}: but{G1161} as touching{G2596} the election{G3588}, they are beloved{G27} for{G1223} the fathers'{G3588} sakes{G1223}.
For{G1063} the gifts{G3588} and{G2532} calling{G3588} of God{G3588} are without repentance{G278}.
For{G1063} as{G5618} ye{G5210} in times past{G4218} have not believed{G544} God{G3588}, yet{G1161} have{G1653} now{G3568} obtained mercy{G1653} through{G543} their{G5130} unbelief{G543}:
Even so{G3779} have{G544} these{G3778} also{G2532} now{G3568} not believed{G544}, that{G2443} through your{G5212} mercy{G1656} they{G846} also{G2532} may obtain mercy{G1653}.
For{G1063} God{G3588} hath concluded{G4788} them all{G3956} in{G1519} unbelief{G543}, that{G2443} he might have mercy upon{G1653} all{G3956}.

O{G5599} the depth{G899} of the riches{G4149} both{G2532} of the wisdom{G4678} and{G2532} knowledge{G1108} of God{G2316}! how{G5613} unsearchable{G419} are his{G846} judgments{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} ways{G3588} past finding out{G421}!
For{G1063} who{G5101} hath known{G1097} the mind{G3563} of the Lord{G2962}? or{G2228} who{G5101} hath been{G1096} his{G846} counsellor{G4825}?
